name: Pokemon Click
description: Gotta catch 'em all! Click on the Pokemon to catch them all!

name: Tiny-Fishing
description: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible.

name: Jewel Monsters
description: A match-3 game to attack the monster by matching identical gems of the same color.

name: Emoji Puzzle
description: A unique game featuring various puzzles based on emojis. Explore the creative and emotional fun between the emojis we use daily.

name: Hole Battle Royale
description: a battle royale game where you consume various items and opponents with smaller holes. You will grow bigger as you swallow!

name: Jewel Monsters
description: World Geography: Flags and Capitals is an educational geography trivia quiz game that tests your geography knowledge!
